Texts.Chs: 更高级的环境光传感器，检测环境光是否超过阈值，以用来激活节点。
Texts.Eng: A more advanced light sensor that activates various nodes based upon whether or not ambient light levels exceed certain thresholds.

Texts.Chs: 更高级的环境光传感感感器，检测环环环境光是否超过阈值，以用来激激激活节点。
Texts.Eng: More advancced light sensssor that activatess variouss nodess if variouss brightnessesss are excceeded.
